result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Derrick L Jeter in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Defendant Derrick L Jeter in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Patricia Schaefer.
The State is in compliance with Ch. 950. Upon pl to all counts in 15CF797; 15CF787 and 15CM1421 will be DRI. The State recommends probation.
P-G to both in 15CF797
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stipulates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty as above. PSI ordered
Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.
Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with victim store except for restitution purposes. The Market,   No contact with the victim NNJ (person, property, residence or family).   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
Restitution request - provided by Victim Witness.   MA $40.00
Status conference on July 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 2, 2015 at 03:15 pm.
